title: Effect of the size of reactant on the rate of reaction / Kesan saiz bahan tindak balas ke atas kadar tindak balas

B: Time taken to collect 30cm³ of gas / Masa yang diambil untuk memgumpul 30cm³ gas

question: Ways to control Manipulated Variable / Cara mengawal Pemboleh ubah dimanipulasikan 是
A: Use the different size of marble / Gunakan saiz marmar yang berbeza
B: Measure the time taken to collect 30cm³ of gas  by using stopwatch / Mengukur masa yang diambil untuk memgumpul 30cm³ gas dengan jam randik
C: Use the same volume of hydrochloric solution / Gunakan isi padu larutan hidroklorik yang sama
D: Use the same mass of marble  / Gunakan jisim marmar yang sama

question: Aim / Tujuan 怎么写?
A: To study the effect of size of marble on the rate of reaction / Untuk mengkaji kesan kepekatan bahan tindak balas terhadap kadar tindak balas tumbuhan
B: What is the effect of  size of marble on the rate of reaction? / Apakah kepekatan suhu bahan tindak balas terhadap kadar tindak balas?
C: Does the size of marble affect the rate of reaction? / Adakah kepekatan bahan tindak balas mempengaruhi kadar tindak balas?
D: The smaller the size of reactants, the higher the rate of reaction / Semakin kecil saiz bahan tindak balas, semakin tinggi kadar tindak balas
